explanation: [0-0] On a gray table, there is a silver object.

[0-10] Next, a pair of pink hands wearing transparent gloves places a silver tray on the gray table. On the tray lies a large banana with wide eyes, a downward-curved mouth, and covered in sweat. The right hand then picks up tweezers, uses a cotton swab to wipe the sweat off the banana's head, and disappears from the right side of the frame. The scene switches to a right hand holding white earphones, moving them back and forth over the banana. The earphones are then removed, and the right hand uses a pen to draw a black, dashed rectangle in the middle of the banana. It then wipes it with a cotton swab, leaving behind a transparent liquid.
